name: North Oaks

name: The Animaelic Forest
taska: Special: Each timer drawn adds +2 discord.
titleb: Special: If discord overflows in the animaelic forest, a character in the group is killed, lost in the maelstrom.
taskb: Special: If a character is knocked out, they are removed from play.
costb: Season End: If this is the sixth year, Red Bank has fallen. You have lost.
